english.segment1: I hear a voice of mmany people. I hear a voice like mighty thunder. Singing Halleluhah for the Lord He reigns
english.segment2: Lamb of God. Holy. Lord You are. Holy. Lamb of God. Holy. You are
english.segment3: So let us be glad. Let us rejoice. And let us give honor, glory to the Lord. And may ever tribe and every tongue. Gather and sing praises to the Holy One
english.segment4: Lamb of God. Holy. Lord You are. Holy. Lamb of God. Holy. You are
english.segment5: Oh, Lamb of God. Holy. Lord You are. Holy. Lamb of God. Holy. You are. Holy. Lamb of God. Holy. Lord You are. Holy. Lamb of God. Holy. You are. Holy
